Package com.andreasmenzel.adds_dji.Manager

Class DJIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andreasmenzel.adds_dji.Manager.DJIManager
  • public class DJIManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for the DJI product. This is the higher-level interface between the app and the DJI product. Updates the information holders and provides methods to control the drone via high-level operation modes.

    • Field Summary

      • productConnected

        @Subscribe
public void productConnected​(ProductConnected event)
        This is executed when a DJI product was connected. Sets up the callback methods to retrieve information about the drone.

      • productChanged

        @Subscribe
public void productChanged​(ProductChanged event)
        This is executed when the DJI product was changed. Sets up the callback methods to retrieve information about the drone IF a product is now connected.

      • setupCallbacks

        private void setupCallbacks()
        Starts the setup callback methods for the battery state and the flight controller state.

      • getProductInstance

        private static dji.sdk.base.BaseProduct getProductInstance()
        Gets the instance of the specific product connected.

      • isAircraftConnected

        public static boolean isAircraftConnected()
        Checks if an aircraft is currently connected (could also be a handheld device).
        Returns:
        true if an aircraft is connected, false otherwise.

        private static dji.sdk.products.Aircraft getAircraftInstance()

        Returns:
        The aircraft instance if one is connected, null otherwise.

      • setupBatteryStateCallback

        private void setupBatteryStateCallback()
        Sets up the battery state callbacks. Makes sure that the SDK starts the processUpdatedBatteryState(...) method when the battery state changes.

      • processUpdatedBatteryState

        private void processUpdatedBatteryState​(@NonNull
                                        dji.common.battery.BatteryState batteryState)
        This method is called whenever the battery state of the connected product changed. Executes the appropriate method(s) that update the information holder(s).
        Parameters:
        batteryState - The new battery state.

      • processUpdatedBatteryStateUpdateAircraftPower

        private void processUpdatedBatteryStateUpdateAircraftPower​(@NonNull
                                                           dji.common.battery.BatteryState batteryState)
        Updates the AircraftPower from an updated flight battery state.
        Parameters:
        batteryState - The new battery state.

      • setupFlightControllerStateCallback

        private void setupFlightControllerStateCallback()
        Sets up the flight controller state callbacks. Makes sure that the SDK starts the processUpdatedFlightControllerState(...) method when the battery state changes.

      • processUpdatedFlightControllerState

        private void processUpdatedFlightControllerState​(@NonNull
                                                 dji.common.flightcontroller.FlightControllerState flightControllerState)
        This method is called whenever the flight controller state of the connected product changed. Executes the appropriate methods that update the information holders.
        Parameters:
        flightControllerState - The new flight controller state.

      • processUpdatedFlightControllerStateUpdateAircraftLocation

      • land

        public void land()
        Changes the high-level operation mode to Landing().

      • takeOffLand

        public void takeOffLand()
        Changes the high-level operation mode to TakeOff(), then Landing().

      • cancel

        public void cancel()

      • virtualStick

        public void virtualStick()
        Changes the high-level operation mode to StartVirtualStick(). The high-level operation mode then automatically changes to UseVirtualStick() and the virtualStickFlightControlData is sent to the SDK.

      • virtualStickAddLeft

        public void virtualStickAddLeft()

      • virtualStickAddRight

        public void virtualStickAddRight()

      • changeHighLevelOperationMode

        public void changeHighLevelOperationMode​(HighLevelOperationMode newHighLevelOperationMode)
        Changes the high-level operation mode. This also performs some checks and potential cleanup depending on the mode currently active.
        Parameters:
        newHighLevelOperationMode - The new high-level operation mode.

      • setNextHighLevelOperationModeFromFinished

        private void setNextHighLevelOperationModeFromFinished​(HighLevelOperationMode nextHighLevelOperationMode)

      • controlDrone

        public void controlDrone()
        Starts the drone control loop.

      • controlDrone

        public void controlDrone​(boolean active)
        Controls the drone depending on the high-level operation mode currently active. This method has to be executed periodically, at least a few times per second.
        Parameters:
        active - If true, continue the drone control loop. If false, stop the drone control loop.

      • controlDroneTakeOff

        private void controlDroneTakeOff​(@NonNull
                                 TakeOff operationMode)
        Tells the drone to take off. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is TakeOff().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneLanding

        private void controlDroneLanding​(@NonNull
                                 Landing operationMode)
        Tells the drone to land. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is Landing().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneCancelTakeOff

        private void controlDroneCancelTakeOff​(@NonNull
                                       CancelTakeOff operationMode)
        Tells the drone to cancel the take off. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is CancelTakeOff().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneCancelLanding

        private void controlDroneCancelLanding​(@NonNull
                                       CancelLanding operationMode)
        Tells the drone to cancel the landing. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is CancelLanding().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneTurnOnMotors

        private void controlDroneTurnOnMotors​(@NonNull
                                      TurnOnMotors operationMode)
        Tells the drone to turn on the motors. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is TurnOnMotors().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneTurnOffMotors

        private void controlDroneTurnOffMotors​(@NonNull
                                       TurnOffMotors operationMode)
        Tells the drone to turn off the motors. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is TurnOffMotors().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneStartVirtualStick

        private void controlDroneStartVirtualStick​(@NonNull
                                           StartVirtualStick operationMode)
        Tells the drone to start the virtual stick mode so the app can simulate a pilot. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is StartVirtualStick().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.

      • controlDroneUseVirtualStick

        private void controlDroneUseVirtualStick​(@NonNull
                                         UseVirtualStick operationMode)
        Tells the drone to use the virtual stick mode by sending FlightControlData. This method is executed when the high-level operation mode is UseVirtualStick().
        Parameters:
        operationMode - The high-level operation mode.
